entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
